text: The Armenian Fastex Premier League is the top football competition in Armenia. == History == It was founded by the Football Federation of Armenia in 1992. From 1936 to 1991, the games were held as a regional tournament within the USSR. For the first three years the season ran from spring to fall, but since the 1995-1996 season, has run from summer to spring. The league currently consists of six teams, and the worst teams relegates to the Armenian First League. Over the years, the league has shrunk from a league consisting of only eight teams to six teams. == 2015–16 teams == * Alashkert * Ararat Yerevan * Banants * Gandzasar Kapan * Pyunik * Shirak == Winners == Year Winner Runner- up 1992 Shirak Banants 1992 Homenetmen (Pyunik) Banants 1993 Ararat Yerevan Shirak 1994 Shirak Homenetmen (Pyunik) 1995 No Winner No Winner 1995–96 Pyunik Shirak 1996–97 Pyunik Ararat Yerevan 1997 Yerevan Shirak 1998 Tsement Ararat Shirak 1999 Shirak Ararat Yerevan 2000 Araks Ararat Ararat Yerevan 2001 Pyunik Zvartnots AAL 2002 Pyunik Shirak 2003 Pyunik Banants 2004 Pyunik Mika 2005 Pyunik Mika 2006 Pyunik Banants 2007 Pyunik Banants 2008 Pyunik Ararat Yerevan 2009 Pyunik Mika 2010 Pyunik Banants 2011 Ulisses Gandzasar 2012–13 Shirak Mika 2013–14 Banants Shirak 2014–15 Pyunik Ulisses 2015–16 Alashkert Shirak ==Related pages== * Armenian Cup * Armenian Super Cup * Armenian National Team * Armenian U-21 National Team * Sports in Armenia == Other websites == * FIFA.com: Table Category:Armenian football clubs
